DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy two different regimen ( vaginal v intramuscular ) progesterone therapy prevention preterm birth high risk pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Vaginal Compared With Intramuscular Progesterone Prevention Preterm Birth High Risk Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study 1 ) To compare efficacy two different regimen progesterone therapy prevent preterm birth le 37 week gestation . 2 ) To compare cost-benefit , adverse effect patient preference two different regimen progesterone therapy . Design : Multi-center , randomize , open-label trial
DOC.criteria: With history prior spontaneous preterm birth short cervix length Spontaneous preterm birth : preterm birth < 37 week gestation due spontaneous preterm labor preterm premature rupture membrane ( PPROM ) Short Cervix length : cervix length < 25 mm measure transvaginal ultrasound 1624 week gestation Multiple gestation Major congenital anomaly Elective prophylactic cervical cerclage < 16 week gestation current pregnancy Previous intentional preterm birth due maternal fetal indication , preeclampsia fetal growth restriction Diabetes , hypertension , severe medical disease
